system.description: Like interposing hand but can grapple (as grasping hand), interpose, or bull rush (+18). Grapple bonus caster level + ability mod + 12 (Str 35) + 4 (Large). Deals 2d6+12 lethal per successful grapple check. New target is move action.

components.materialDescription: Egg shell. Focus: snakeskin glove (arcane); divine focus (divine).
